entry.title: ganeshburri/TransactX: TransactX is a modern, lightweight Paytm-like digital wallet app ‚Äî built for seamless peer-to-peer transfers, wallet top-ups, and real-time transaction history. The project is architected as a monorepo using Turborepo, enabling shared code, fast builds, and a scalable developer workflow across the Next.js app and simulated bank-webhook service.
entry.content: TransactX is a modern, lightweight Paytm-like digital wallet app ‚Äî built for seamless peer-to-peer transfers, wallet top-ups, and real-time transaction history. The project is architected as a monorepo using Turborepo, enabling shared code, fast builds, and a scalable developer workflow across the Next.js app and simulated bank-webhook service.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
